title: Add search feature
description: As a user, I want to search for content within the application so that I can quickly find specific information without manually browsing through all available data.
iWant: to search for content within the application
soThat: I can quickly find specific information without manually browsing

acceptanceTests.title: Basic search functionality
given: I am on the application main page
when: I enter a search term in the search box
then: I should see relevant results displayed
The results should appear within 3 seconds
